Counter Strike: Global Offensive is a pleasant addition to the Counter Strike series. It has both the arcade feel of old shooters, and the tactical depth of games like Rainbow Six and Arma. While not as intense, this games competitive is a game of skill, communication, and teamwork. I highly recommend this game.

This is honestly my favourite game ever. It's a really good and cool fps game to play, both for fun and competetively. Althoug I really enjoy playing CS:GO, I'd really wish they'd respect their community more, and come up with some updates on a more regular basis than they do at the moment.

I really recomment playing the game!

Игра скатилась, чем больше обнов - тем больше дерьма. После того, как игра стала бесплатной, туда хлынул всякий сброд. Прибавьте к этому сброду читеров и забивание разработчиками огромного болта на игроков и вы получите Counter Strike. Не знаю таких людей, кто бы играл в это на серьёзных щах

The best FPS out there. Just be warned, it's best enjoyed with a team of regulars and a bit of investment into learning strategies... and that's when the addiction kicks in... Be prepared to live CSGO, sleep CSGO...
